tool_description: Access Poshmark's public data with our Scraper API for comprehensive information retrieval such as Search Results, Product Details and more.
name: Poshmark
title: Poshmark

api_list.name: Search By User

required_parameters.name: sortBy
required_parameters.description: Options: best_match, added_desc, price_desc, price_asc, price_drop, like_count, relevance_v2, recommended, shared_at_asc, added_asc

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Can be accessed through the **Categories** endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: brands
optional_parameters.description:
Can be accessed through the **Brands** endpoint.
Multiple Options allowed: Brand||Brand||Brand||Brand...

optional_parameters.name: colors
optional_parameters.description:
Options: Black, Blue, White, Gray, Pink, Red, Green, Cream, Brown, Tan, Purple, Silver, Gold, Orange, Yellow
Multiple Options allowed: Color||Color||Color||Color...

api_list.name: Product Information
api_list.description: Get Product Information By Product ID

required_parameters.name: productID
required_parameters.description: Can be accessed through the **Search** endpoints.

api_list.name: Brands
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://poshmark3.p.rapidapi.com/brands"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "poshmark3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
